definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Sandra and her family where very dear friends of the Hatches'.
sentences.chinese: 桑德拉一家和哈奇夫妇是很亲密的好朋友。

sentences.english: They traveled together and she took the Hatches to doctors' appointments.
sentences.chinese: 他们一起旅游，桑德拉还带哈奇夫妇看医生。

sentences.english: so did Scarlett Johansson and Sandra Bullock.
sentences.chinese: 思嘉丽约翰逊和桑德拉布洛克也这么做了。

sentences.english: Mrs Atkins; Stop it, Sandra. Here's your tea, some toast?
sentences.chinese: 别跳，桑德拉。这是你的茶，要点土司吗？

sentences.english: The Landau luck, Mark and Sandra were convinced, had finally shifted.
sentences.chinese: “兰朵好运”在马克和桑德拉身上再次等到显灵。

sentences.english: As Sandra kissed her husband goodbye, they both cried.
sentences.chinese: 当桑德拉吻别丈夫的时候，所有人都哭了。

sentences.english: A brutally honest doctor said that Sandra could drop dead at any time.
sentences.chinese: 医生开门见山的说，桑德拉随时可能会死。

sentences.english: My friend Sandra won the record for the largest book.
sentences.chinese: 我的朋友桑德拉获得了拥有最大书的纪录。

sentences.english: Mark joined her, holding her in his arms.
sentences.chinese: 马克靠近桑德拉，用双臂紧紧的搂住她。
我肯定会去参加卡桑德拉的同学会。

sentences.english: One day, I finally said to Sondra I was ready to see a surrogate.
sentences.chinese: 一天，我终于对于桑德拉说我准备去看性爱代理。

sentences.english: Mr. Fowle and Cassandra are only recently engaged.
sentences.chinese: 福尔先生和卡桑德拉才刚订婚。

sentences.english: I don't know whether to ask Sandra or Carl to draw the poster.
sentences.chinese: 我不知道让桑德拉还是卡尔来画张贴画。

sentences.english: Enrico Rikki Dee had the entrepreneurial skill to turn it into reality.
sentences.chinese: 庞迪团队桑德拉了创业技能，把它变成现实。

definition: Michel or Mitchell (name)/George Mitchell (1933-), US Democratic party politician and diplomat, influential in brokering Northern Ireland peace deal in 1990s, US Middle East special envoy from 2009
